title: 求解
content:
各位大家好 

最近寫題目寫到一題有點納悶 

想請問大家

I interviewed people who ____  the questionnaire or were recommended by the school of Scottish studies.
（a) either filled out
  (b) either filling out 
  (c) had withered out
(D). had either filling out
答案是a 想請問 選項c為什麼不能選啊
excerpt: 各位大家好，最近寫題目寫到一題有點納悶，想請問大家，I interviewed people who ____  the questionnaire or were recommended by th
